channel.title: Jobs on Arcturus Industries
channel.description: Recent content in Jobs on Arcturus Industries

item.title: Real-time 3D Perception Deep Learning Engineer
item.description: We are looking for passionate, self-driven and talented engineers to improve 3D awareness in Augmented and Virtual Reality (AR/VR) to the next level.

item.title: Senior Computer Vision / SLAM Engineer in AR/VR
item.description: We are looking for passionate, self-driven, talented computer vision engineers / researchers to help us bring AR/VR perception (tracking, mapping, and beyond) to the next-level.

item.title: Senior Software Engineer in Mobile AR/VR (ARM/DSP/GPU)
item.description: We are looking for a passionate, talented software engineer to help us bring AR/VR perception (tracking, mapping, and beyond) to the next-level.

item.title: Software Engineer in SLAM Evaluation for AR/VR
item.description: We are looking for passionate, self-driven, talented engineers to maintain and improve our testing infrastructure and help us bring AR/VR perception to the next-level.
